sentences.sContent: I can play some instruments like Erhu, piano, harmonium, but I just play baby music.
sentences.sContent_eng: I can play some instruments like Erhu, piano, harmonium, but I just play baby music.
sentences.sCn: 我会二胡、钢琴、脚踏琴，不过只会弹简单的幼儿水平音乐。

trans.tranOther: a musical instrument with a keyboard and metal pipes like a small organ
